message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'd be willing to make a deal at that price.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $160. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to make a deal at this price.
I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob. I can offer you the product for $155. It's a bit higher than your latest offer, but I think it's a fair compromise. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit far from being comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $145. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $150. It's my minimum price, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on that. Let's meet in the middle at $147.50. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the product at this price.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $140. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
